summary: Germaine Debruycker is 18 when the workers at the Vieille Montagne factory, including her father, go on strike to obtain a 10 franc raise. The turbulent strike lasts for 9 weeks and changes their lives forever. Based on a true story.
cast: Stany Crets|Tiny Bertels|Michel van Dousselaere|Evelien Bosmans|Clara Cleymans|Herwig Ilegems|Bart Hollanders|Veerle Dobbelaere|Koen De Bouw|Lucas Van den Eynde|Axel Daeseleire|Luc Nuyens|Tom Dewispelaere|Jonas Leemans|Mathijs Scheepers|Stef Aerts|Carl Berteele|Warre Borgmans|Natalia Druyts|Arne Focketyn|Ludo Hoogmartens|Mark Irons|Eric Jacobs|Paul Jansen|Maarten Ketels|GÃ¼nther Lesage|Alex Martens|Ben Segers|Matteo Simoni|Jasper Steverlinck|Jan Van Den Audenaerde|Stefaan Van den Broeck|Walter Van Den Broeck|Peter Van den Heuvel|Guido van Meir|Rik Verheye|Tom Wuyts|Jef Sleeckx
title: Groenten uit Balen
